faq.a1: We review your current AI automation stack, identify operational gaps, assess ownership clarity, and evaluate production readiness. You'll receive a written summary with prioritized recommendations.
faq.q2: How long is the assessment call?
faq.a2: 30–45 minutes. We focus on understanding your setup and challenges, not pitching services.
faq.a3: Yes, the initial assessment is free. We believe in earning trust before asking for commitment.
faq.a4: You receive a one-page operational summary. If there's a fit, we can discuss next steps. If not, you keep the insights.
